data.text: @MattRinaldiTX I guess they fear you night produce the zombie variant if you glowing in the dark when you catch COVID.

@KonniBurton Ingrate. Before Covid, they didn’t even recommend a mask for a pandemic. Now, because of science, we know how to prevent spreading colds during nuclear Armageddon. https://t.co/DQflQaAWua
@MattRinaldiTX These are not intellectually competent people.
You also should wear a mask during a volcano eruption, though they specify it is totally ineffective for preventing the inhalation of volcanic ash. https://t.co/k44eYHs9Im
@MattRinaldiTX @1artniece2 Its not the heat of the nuclear blast, its the COVIDity.
@MattRinaldiTX This is unbelievable.  I never thought I would live to see the day of such complete and utter incompetence on the part of elected leaders.  Truly ridiculous times we live in.
@MattRinaldiTX Because covid is so much more deadly than a nuclear bomb. What is wrong with these people!
@MattRinaldiTX I cant even anymore. Wow. Just wow.
